definition: square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter
root/basis/classifier for long slender objects, e.g. cigarettes, guitar strings/CL:條|条[tiao2]/radical (chemistry)

sentences.english: All right. So we have that square root NR.
sentences.chinese: 好，看看這個NR求平方根方法。

sentences.english: You have square root of minus one for something else.
sentences.chinese: 你得到了某個負數的平方根。

sentences.english: Generally, the reduction falls as the square root of the number of terms in the series.
sentences.chinese: 通常，縮減量隨着系列中術語的數量的平方根下降。

sentences.english: Or, it could act like a square root machine.
sentences.chinese: 或者，它可以表現的像個開平方根的機器。

sentences.english: Lower RMSD values were obtained, indicating a better superposition of the structures in the sets.
sentences.chinese: 較低的均方根偏差值，獲得更好的疊加顯示的結構套。

sentences.english: Having found all square roots of an identity matrix.
sentences.chinese: 找出了單位矩陣的所有平方根。

sentences.english: A new combining algorithm of decentralized square root information filtering for linear discrete-time systems is presented.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究一種新的分散信息平方根濾波算法。

sentences.english: This paper analyzes the influence of the shadowing effect for different surface RMS slope.
sentences.chinese: 本文分析了不同表面均方根率對遮蔽效應的影響。

sentences.english: You also send a fault response if someone requests the square root of a negative number.
sentences.chinese: 如果有人請求負數的平方根，也將發送錯誤響應。

sentences.english: The clutter in the images was computal as the rms noise inthe pixel levels over the image.
sentences.chinese: 圖象內的噪聲是以象元電平爲單位的約方根形式計算。
烏黑的惡性平方根的跡象？

sentences.english: The square root of nine is three.
Is the square root ever going to be less than 0?
sentences.chinese: 一個數的平方根會小於0麼？

sentences.english: A simple workaround is to use an animated value as the square root of the destination value.
sentences.chinese: 一個簡單的變通方法是用帶動畫價值的平方根目的值。

sentences.english: The square root of two times 15.15.

definition: surd (math.)/algebraic expression involving a square root or other irrationality
to square a number/to calculate the square
cube root/to extract a cube root
field of complex numbers (math.), usually denoted by C
